name.ja: <ruby>伍世壊摘心<rt>マナドゥム・アブシジョン</rt></ruby>

text.en: Target 1 monster you control; destroy it, and if you do, add 1 "Primal Planet Kalarium" from your Deck to your hand, or, if you control "Primal Planet Kalarium", you can add 1 "Manadome" Spell/Trap to your hand instead, except "Manadome Abscission". You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Visas Starfrost" or 1 monster with 1500 ATK/2100 DEF from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Manadome Abscission" once per turn.
